channel.title: work on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in work on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-14
item.description: Android 13 leaks: More Material You options, opt-in to app notifications (7 minute read) Android 13’s first developer previews won’t be out until at least March, but several sources have already begun leaking its new features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-21
item.description: Meta Has Created A New Tool To Animate Your Child’s Drawings Using AI (1 minute read) Animated Drawings is a tool from Meta that can automatically animate drawings of human-like figures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-02
item.description: DoorDash isn’t just delivering meals—it’s making them, too (3 minute read) DoorDash is opening a temporary kitchen to make meals for six restaurants in San Jose, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-28
item.description: Tencent’s WeChat suspends new user registration in China to comply with ‘relevant laws and regulations’ (2 minute read) WeChat has temporarily suspended registrations for new users in China while it upgrades its security technology to align with all relevant laws and regulations.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-10
item.description: Facebook plans first smartwatch for next summer with two cameras, heart rate monitor (3 minute read) Facebook’s smartwatch will feature two cameras on a detachable display.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-08
item.description: T-Mobile launches long-promised 5G home internet service (2 minute read) T-Mobile’s 5G home internet service is now available for 30 million homes in the US, 10 million of which are in rural areas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-16
item.description: Amazon expands gamification program that encourages warehouse employees to work harder (3 minute read) FC Games is a program that gamifies warehouse work for Amazon workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-10
item.description: Amazon’s long-rumored Vesta home robot project details leak (2 minute read) Amazon’s project Vesta is a long-rumored home robot that features built-in Alexa, multiple integrated cameras, a display, and the ability to move around a home.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-05
item.description: Watch SpaceX ACTUALLY hop Starship SN-5 150m!!! (55 minute video) SpaceX recently performed its first test flight on Starship SN-5.
